hero.title: Our Store
hero.subtitle: EcoSphere is your trusted destination for eco-friendly products, sustainable gifts, and smart green choices. Browse a variety of earth-conscious items made to help you live cleaner, better, and more naturally every day.

story.label: About Us
story.title: Building a greener future together Forever
story.description: EcoSphere was created to make sustainable shopping simple, trustworthy, and accessible. With greenwashing becoming widespread, consumers are often overwhelmed or unsure who to trust. EcoSphere bridges that gapâ€”connecting verified, planet-friendly businesses with the growing community of people who want to shop responsibly.

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.title: Making sustainability
mission.description: EcoSphere exists to bridge the gap between conscious consumers and ethical enterprises. We strip away the guesswork of "greenwashing" by providing a rigorously vetted marketplace where every choice is a verified step towards a better planet.

forConsumers.title: For Consumers
forConsumers.description: Instant access to transparent, planet-first products without the research fatigue.

forBusinesses.title: For Businesses
forBusinesses.description: High-visibility growth for brands that prioritize integrity over easy profits.

vision.label: Our Vision
vision.title: A world where
vision.description: Our vision is to help create an interconnected, global economy where sustainable and regenerative commerce is the

hero.title: Shops
hero.subtitle: Shops for eco-friendly products and gifts made with love for our planet.

quality.title: Quality You Can Trust
quality.description: We check every partner shop with real care keeping things healthy, planet-friendly, and a little fun along the way. Hover over a card to explore it!

planetFriendly.title: Planet-Friendly Products
planetFriendly.text: Each shop prioritizes items that are inherently sustainable and kind to the environment, minimizing ecological impact.

ecoConscious.title: Eco-Conscious Sourcing
ecoConscious.text: They ensure full responsibility and ethical sourcing, favoring materials that are renewable, recycled, or low-waste.

commitment.title: Commitment to You
commitment.text: Products are carefully selected to be safe, kind to your health, and promote a holistic, sustainable lifestyle.
